title: How to Make an Easy Broccoli Casserole

steps.headline: Pre-heat the oven to 350 degrees and turn a burner to medium-high heat.
Prepare the stuffing mix by following the directions on the box.
Take the bag of broccoli and spread it out in the bottom of the casserole dish
Spread the cream of mushroom over the broccoli.
Sprinkle the cheese over the cream of mushroom to taste.
Spread the cooked stuffing mix evenly over the cheese.
Place the casserole dish in the pre-heated oven.
Let cook for 20-25 minutes.
steps.description: The stuffing should be a golden crisp brown that indicates it is ready.

steps.headline: Remove from the stove and let cool briefly.

text: Pre-heat the oven to 350 degrees and turn a burner to medium-high heat.  Prepare the stuffing mix by following the directions on the box.  Take the bag of broccoli and spread it out in the bottom of the casserole dish  Spread the cream of mushroom over the broccoli.  Sprinkle the cheese over the cream of mushroom to taste.  Spread the cooked stuffing mix evenly over the cheese.  Place the casserole dish in the pre-heated oven.  Let cook for 20-25 minutes. The stuffing should be a golden crisp brown that indicates it is ready. Remove from the stove and let cool briefly.  Enjoy!
